nodes.name: H2OGLRM
nodes.description: Generalized Low Rank Models (GLRM) is an algorithm for dimensionality reduction of a dataset
nodes.details:
Generalized Low Rank Models (GLRM) is an algorithm for dimensionality reduction of a dataset. It is a general, parallelized optimization algorithm that applies to a variety of loss and regularization functions. Categorical columns are handled by expansion into 0/1 indicator columns for each level. With this approach, GLRM is useful for reconstructing missing values and identifying important features in heterogeneous data.

More details are available at : docs.h2o.ai/h2o/latest-stable/h2o-docs/data-science/glrm.html

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: k
fields.title: K
fields.description: Specify the rank of matrix approximation

fields.name: ignored_columns
fields.title: Ignored Columns
fields.description: Specify the column or columns to be exclude from the model

fields.name: ignore_const_cols
fields.title: Ignore Const Cols
fields.description: Specify whether to ignore constant training columns

fields.name: score_each_iteration
fields.title: Score Each Iteration
fields.description: Specify whether to score during each iteration of the model training

fields.name: transform
fields.title: Transform
fields.description: Specify the transformation method for the training data: None, Standardize, Normalize, Demean, or Descale. The default is None.

fields.name: loss
fields.title: Loss
fields.description: Specify the numeric loss function: Quadratic, Absolute, Huber, Poisson, Hinge, or Periodic.

fields.name: multi_loss
fields.title: Multi Loss
fields.description: Specify either Categorical or Ordinal for the categorical loss function.

fields.name: period
fields.title: Period
fields.description: When loss=periodic, specify the length of the period

fields.name: regularization_x
fields.title: Regularization X
fields.description: Specify the regularization function for the X matrix: None, Quadratic, L2, L1, NonNegative, OneSparse, UnitOneSparse, or Simplex.

fields.name: regularization_y
fields.title: Regularization Y
fields.description: Specify the regularization function for the Y matrix: None, Quadratic, L2, L1, NonNegative, OneSparse, UnitOneSparse, or Simplex.

fields.name: gamma_x
fields.title: Gamma X
fields.description: Specify the regularization weight on the X matrix.

fields.name: gamma_y
fields.title: Gamma Y
fields.description: Specify the regularization weight on the Y matrix.

fields.name: max_iterations
fields.title: Max Iterations
fields.description: Specify the maximum number of training iterations. The range is 0 to 1e6.

fields.name: max_updates
fields.title: Max Updates
fields.description: Specify the maximum number of updates.

fields.name: init_step_size
fields.title: Init Step Size
fields.description: Specify the initial step size.

fields.name: min_step_size
fields.title: Min Step Size
fields.description: Specify the minimum step size.

fields.name: seed
fields.title: Seed
fields.description: Specify the random number generator (RNG) seed for algorithm components dependent on randomization.

fields.name: init_placeholder
fields.title: Init Placeholder
fields.description: Specify the initialization mode: Random, SVD, PlusPlus, or User.

fields.name: svd_method
fields.title: SVD Method
fields.description: Specify the method for computing SVD during initialization: GramSVD, Power, Randomized.

fields.name: expand_user_y
fields.title: Expand User Y
fields.description: Specify whether to expand categorical columns in the user-specified initial Y value.

fields.name: impute_original
fields.title: Impute Original
fields.description: Specify whether to reconstruct the original training data by reversing the data transform after projecting archetypes.

fields.name: recover_svd
fields.title: Recover SVD
fields.description: Specify whether to recover singular values and eigenvectors of XY.

fields.name: max_runtime_secs
fields.title: Max Runtimesecs
fields.description: Specify the maximum allowed runtime in seconds for model training. Use 0 to disable.

nodes.name: PrintNRows
nodes.description: Prints the specified number of records in the DataFrame. It is useful for seeing intermediate output

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: n
fields.title: Num Rows to Print
fields.description: number of rows to be printed

fields.name: displayDataType
fields.title: Display Data Type
fields.description: If true display rows DataType

fields.name: comment
fields.value:
This workflow performs a variety of loss and regularization functions of the Creditcardfraud Dataset.


It uses H2O GLRM with k=2


http://docs.h2o.ai/h2o/latest-stable/h2o-docs/data-science/glrm.html
